## Advanced webinar success

On **December 9**, the team hosted the **Open and reproducible analysis of light exposure and visual experience data** webinar in **two sessions**, covering **two of the four advanced use cases**. The sessions offered a deep dive into the LightLogR workflow and showcased how to implement advanced analyses in a transparent, reproducible way.

For materials and updates, visit the [LightLogR webinar page](https://tscnlab.github.io/LightLogR_webinar/).

---

### Thank you to our learners

A special note of appreciation: we sent out **122 certificates** to participants from the beginner and advanced workshops. Thank you for your dedication to open, reproducible research and for being part of this growing community.
